1.1.name: wordpress/parament
1.1.description: Parament is a great all-purpose theme featuring a dark color scheme with bright orange highlights and a textured background. Add your own personal flair by uploading a custom header or background image. Parament's full-width image template allows your images to display as large as possible for maximum impact.
